Feats-General -- Male Versatile Heritage Human Rogue: 3
Strength: 12 (+1) Dexterity: 14 (+2) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 12 (+1) Wisdom: 10 (+0) Charisma: 16 (+3)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Chaotic Evil Deity: None
Experience: 2500/3000 Level: 3 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13
Ability Notes:

Hefty Hauler: +2 Encumbered Bulk/+2 Maximum Bulk
Breath Control: Can hold breath for 175 rd without suffocating
Feather Step: Can Step into difficult terrain

Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +1 on untrained skill checks
Assurance (Deception): Can take an automatic 19 on Deception checks
Expeditious Search: Can Search at 2x normal Speed
Quick Coercion: Can Coerce with 1 rd of conversation
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command An Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 41 Armor Class: 20 (dexterity (2 max); trained) Class DC: Rogue: 18 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Hide Shield: None Weapons: Bastard Sword (+6 1d8+1 S [2h d12]; strength; trained); Dagger (+7 1d4+1 P/S R10'; dexterity; trained); Scimitar (+6 1d6+1 S; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Medium Armor)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +6
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Longbow; Composite Longbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortbow; Composite Shortbow)/Weapon Familiarity (Elf Weapons)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Toughness: +3 Hit Points
Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons): Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of up to level 3
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon elf weapons
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Quick Draw: (1) Draws a weapon and Strikes
Scoundrel: Successful Feint inflicts flat-footed on foe vs. self attacks, or all attacks on a critical success, until the end of the next turn
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts flat-footed vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Twin Feint: (2) Strikes with a melee weapon in each hand, inflicting flat-footed vs. the second
Save: Fortitude: +9 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Expert (Fortitude)
Canny Acumen (Reflex): Save Expert (Reflex)
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Expert (Will)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats, and successes vs. inhaled threats are critical successes
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Spell Slots: PC1: 2 Attack: Primal: +8 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Primal: 18 (charisma; trained)
Magic Notes:
Minor Magic (Primal): Spell Trained (Primal)/Knows 2 primal cantrips
Incredible Investiture: Can invest 12 magic items
Notes
Validation Errors:
Expeditious Search Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and perception rank (currently 2) >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 5 available vs. 23 allocated
Incredible Investiture Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 11 and charisma modifier (currently 3) >= 3
